title: PF2e Investigators: Pivots & Complications
description: Introduces new Investigator feats that smoothen the in-combat gameplay.

complication.label: Complication
complication.description: Feats with the complication trait allow you to capitalise on a good Devise a Stratagem roll further. When you take an action with the complication trait, until the start of your next turn, the next check you substitute your Devise a Stratagem roll for is modified according to the complication action's description, and the check takes a -2 penalty. You may only use one action with the complication trait per round.

pivot.label: Pivot
pivot.description: Feats with the pivot trait can be used to discard the result rolled from the Devise a Stratagem action. You must use pivot actions immediately after you used the Devise a Stratagem action. When you do so, you lose the result of the roll from Devise a Stratagem, unable to substitute it for a Strike later during your round, then use the ability described in the action. As a pivot action discards your Devise a Stratagem roll, and pivot actions need a Devise a Stratagem roll to be used, you can typically only use one pivot action per round. Pivot feats may also have a Turnabout line in their description. If the dice value of your discarded Devise a Stratagem roll was 15 or higher, you may choose to also follow the abilities written in that line.
